row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.POWERSHELL_UTILITY :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_AMAZON.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_ENVIRONMENT@WINDOWS
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_AMAZON.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_COMMON_OPTIONS
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
Write-Host Creating new internet gateway..
$output = java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/itpa-tool.jar" arb -cmd execute $env:EC2_HOME\bin\ec2-create-internet-gateway.cmd &UC4RB_AWS_COMMON_OPTIONS#
$result = $output | select-string -pattern ^INTERNETGATEWAY -caseSensitive
if (![bool]($result)) { Write-Host Failed to create internet gateway $error = [string]::join("`n", $output) Write-Host $error exit 1 }
Write-Host $result Write-Host "`nSuccessfully create internet gateway"
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS

row.post_process:
:SET &output_entry# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(, , "REP", "INTERNETGATEWAY*") :PROCESS &output_entry# : SET &output_line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&output_entry#, 1)
! Extract the delimiter character from this output_line, usually the tab character : SET &tab# = STR_CUT(&output_line#, 16, 1)
: SET &output_line# = SUBSTR(&output_line#, 17) ! Replace all tab characters with single space : SET &output_line# = STR_SUB(&output_line#, &tab#, " ") : SET &UC4RB_OUT_GATEWAY_ID# = STR_TRIM(&output_line#) : PUBLISH &UC4RB_OUT_GATEWAY_ID#, , "WORKFLOW" : PRINT Out Gateway ID = &UC4RB_OUT_GATEWAY_ID#
: ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &output_entry#
